::Zardus/Scavanger/Hiss/Reptilica/Prowl::

Zardus dodges the fireballs from Arcangel, firing back with his automatic.

"Reptilica, get out here," he say into his comm, "No, better yet, get to the 
hostages. If they don't retreat soon, kill them."

"Allright," Reptilica's voice replies.

Zardus raises his voice so the Maximals would hear, "You attack has angered 
us quite alot," he says, "I suggest you get out of here, or the hostages die. 
Painfully."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavanger yells in pain as Icedragon starts clawing at his back. The 
Oblitercon spins around, pressing his rifle against the Maximal and firing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss dives under one missile, the other one hitting him in the arm, the arm 
flying off. He clenches his teeth as fireball hit him, charring his body.

Hiss growls, firing his rifle, still in the other arm, and Atcangel.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica turns to face Prowl, his gun aimed at the Maximal's head.

"The Maximals havn't retreated yet," he says, "I will give you one last 
chance to call them off or blow up this base. Either one fails, I'll kill 
you. And your friends."

At that last comment, the other Alliance bots there aim their weapons at the 
Maximals, autoguns emerging from the cealing.

Prowl swears silently. Arcangel was getting them all killed! Because he was 
too slaggin' stupid to follow orders and retreat. He was going to kill the 
bot when this is all over....

"Allright," he says, "I'll try again."

"Arcangel," he says, activating his comm-link, "Get out of here! You're going 
to get us all killed. Take the others and get the pit out of here. That's an 
order. If you don't follow this one, you're going to have a nice long talk 
with Iron Raptor."

Reptilica waits for the Maximals to answer, ready to give the order to 
fire....
